__e: It is a gift of the shrine and from all of us who risked great danger to bring you here, one last chance to be with those you love.
{\pos(192,210)}I don't know about the Sanctuary, and I don't know who you guys are.
This is their sanctuary, and they need to feel safe, because...they have not been safe.
I think you'd make a national shrine out of it... a constant reminder of the things you've attained.
I want this office to be a sanctuary for you.
'I am, as you know, in sanctuary to protect me from our enemies.
now the holy voice speaking in the sanctuary of my soul is filled with forgiveness and love.
He has a shrine of you in his bedroom.
You cannot bring weapons and gunpowder into a sanctuary of God.
Behind me is the Grizzly Sanctuary and also behind me, hidden down below in those trees somewhere, is my camp.
Ask him how long it would be on foot to the bird sanctuary.
Oh, my God, what is with the bird sanctuary?
